songs.title: Rapture*
songs.lyrics:
*Lyrics From Snippet*

[Verse]
Recording massacres
Bastard said it's spectacular
He went from selling herb on the curb to preaching word to the birds
Getting head while I'm swervin' on all the feds

*Possible Lyrics*
[Verse]
What would you describe as a criminal?
Dark skin pigment
Fuck a sumliminal, leaving all these niggas disfigured, triggers and chemical
Bodybags is coming, you running, praying for miracles
They coming gunning inside of a bullet-proof vehicle, destined to be questioned
What they reckoned was insanity
Nicotine and listerine, they taking all our vanity
